memberdef.name: boot_swap_tables

briefdescription.para: This set of tables maps image trailer contents to swap operation type.

detaileddescription.para: When searching for a match, these tables must be iterated sequentially.
NOTE: the table order is very important. The settings in Slot 1 always are priority to Slot 0 and should be located earlier in the table.
The table lists only states where there is action needs to be taken by the bootloader, as in starting/finishing a swap operation.

briefdescription.para: Reads the image trailer from the scratch area.
Marks the image in slot 1 as pending.

detaileddescription.para: On the next reboot, the system will perform a one-time boot of the slot 1 image.

parameterdescription.para: Whether the image should be used permanently or only tested once: 0=run image once, then confirm or revert. 1=run image forever.

briefdescription.para: Marks the image in slot 0 as confirmed.

detaileddescription.para: The system will continue booting into the image in slot 0 until told to boot from a different slot.
